SEARCH
Package com.example.myapplication.features.user.home

Class UHomeModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.myapplication.features.user.home.UHomeModel
public class UHomeModel extends Object
Model for the user home screen. Holds the event data and active filters.

  • Constructor Details

    • UHomeModel

      public UHomeModel()

  • Method Details

    • setEvents

      public void setEvents(@Nullable List<UserEvent> newEvents)
      Replaces the current event list with the provided collection. Clears existing events and adds all non-null events from the provided list.
      Parameters:
      newEvents - The list of events to store, or null to clear all events.

    • getEvents

      public List<UserEvent> getEvents()
      Returns a copy of the stored events. Creates a new list to prevent external modification of the internal event list.
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing all stored events.

    • setSelectedInterests

      public void setSelectedInterests(@Nullable List<String> interests)
      Stores the current interest filters. Clears existing interests and replaces them with the provided list.
      Parameters:
      interests - The list of interest tags to filter by, or null to clear all interests.

    • getSelectedInterests

      public List<String> getSelectedInterests()
      Returns the current selected interests as a copy. Creates a new list to prevent external modification of the internal interest list.
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing all selected interest tags.

    • setAvailabilityRange

      public void setAvailabilityRange(@Nullable Long startMillis, @Nullable Long endMillis)
      Persists the selected availability range. Sets the time range filter for displaying events.
      Parameters:
      startMillis - The start of the availability range in milliseconds since epoch, or null.
      endMillis - The end of the availability range in milliseconds since epoch, or null.

    • clearAvailability

      public void clearAvailability()
      Clears the availability range filter. Removes any time-based filtering by setting both start and end times to null.

    • getAvailabilityStartMillis

      @Nullable public Long getAvailabilityStartMillis()
      Returns the start of the current availability filter range.
      Returns:
      The start time in milliseconds since epoch, or null if not set.

    • getAvailabilityEndMillis

      @Nullable public Long getAvailabilityEndMillis()
      Returns the end of the current availability filter range.
      Returns:
      The end time in milliseconds since epoch, or null if not set.

    • buildDisplayEvents

      public List<UserEvent> buildDisplayEvents()
      Applies the currently configured filters to the stored events. Filters out past events, applies interest matching, and applies availability range filtering.
      Returns:
      A new list containing only events that match all active filters.

    • filterEventsForDisplay

      public static List<UserEvent> filterEventsForDisplay(@Nullable List<UserEvent> allEvents, @Nullable String currentUserId)
      Filters out events belonging to the current user. Returns only events where the organizer ID does not match the current user ID.
      Parameters:
      allEvents - The complete list of events to filter.
      currentUserId - The ID of the current user whose events should be excluded.
      Returns:
      A new list containing only events not organized by the current user.

    • isUpcomingEvent

      public static boolean isUpcomingEvent(@NonNull UserEvent event, long currentMillis)
      Returns whether an event has not yet finished. Compares the event's end time (or start time if end is not set) against the current time.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to check.
      currentMillis - The current time in milliseconds since epoch.
      Returns:
      True if the event's end time is in the future, false otherwise.

    • filterEventsByInterests

      public static List<UserEvent> filterEventsByInterests(@Nullable List<UserEvent> allEvents, @Nullable List<String> interests)
      Filters events by matching their theme with the provided interests. Uses case-insensitive matching between event themes and interest tags.
      Parameters:
      allEvents - The list of events to filter.
      interests - The list of interest tags to match against.
      Returns:
      A new list containing only events whose theme matches at least one interest.

    • filterEventsByAvailability

      public static List<UserEvent> filterEventsByAvailability(@Nullable List<UserEvent> allEvents, long startTime, long endTime)
      Filters events to those that overlap with the provided availability range. An event overlaps if any part of it falls within the specified time range.
      Parameters:
      allEvents - The list of events to filter.
      startTime - The start of the availability range in milliseconds since epoch.
      endTime - The end of the availability range in milliseconds since epoch.
      Returns:
      A new list containing only events that overlap with the time range.
